testcase.name: As a user, I want to book the room and Store its order number in Excel
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch the browser...............................................passed And User Login with Valid Details "sowndharya97sathy" and "Sownd@123".......passed When User Clicks the Login Button...........................................passed Then Validate the HomePage..................................................passed And User Enters the details for Room........................................passed When User clicks Search button..............................................passed Then Validate the Search Hotel Page.........................................passed And User Selects the hotel..................................................passed When User clicks Continue Button............................................passed Then Validate Book Hotel Page...............................................passed And User enter the userDetails and Payment Details..........................passed When User clicks Book Now button............................................passed Then Validate Booking Confirmation..........................................passed And Fetch Order Number and store in Excel...................................passed When User Clicks MyItenary..................................................passed Then Validate the Booking confirmation Detials..............................passed
